alert.note: Alert for Big Island Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 06 at 4:01AM HST until February 06 at 12:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY FOR MAUNA KEA AND MAUNA LOA SUMMITS... .Moisture and sub-freezing temperatures over the Summits will generate snow and freezing rain through this morning. Freezing rain will likely be the primary hazard. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON HST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain and snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Big Island Summits. * WHEN...Until noon HST today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible as summit roadways may become icy. Visibility will be significantly reduced at times.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while driving.
